channel.title: Blog on João Pedro Silva
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on João Pedro Silva

item.title: Using a Memory Pool to Speed Up String Manipulation
item.description: Lately I’ve been trying to learn more about code optimization, specifically how to make code faster. I’ve been doing this partly out of frustration from having to deal with slow software on a daily basis, and partly out of curiosity after listening to a bunch of talks and lectures about it by a lot of smart people. In my research I came accross Agner Fog’s Software Optimization Resources, and I’ve been slowly making my way through the listed manuals.
